code: @Test public void testAspect() {     // nothing to really test. it is enough if we don't get error while creating app context     new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(getClass().getSimpleName() + ".xml", getClass()). }

@Around(value = "execution(* org.springframework.tests.sample.beans.TestBean.*(..)) and this(bean) and args(argument)", argNames = "bean,argument") public void increment(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp, TestBean bean, Object argument) throws Throwable {     pjp.proceed(). }
